column2: an A.M. Eatery////We came here after our morning church service. As expected the wait time was roughly 50 minutes
column3: but knowing what to expect we waited to be seated. Our waiter Teri was benevolent enough to answer all our questions and sum! The service itself deserved 5 stars as she went above and beyond to make sure our first time experience was one to remember! Now the food. Jesus Christ almighty
column4: the food was amazing. I got the pancake mix that lets your choose three different favors of pancakes mine being: OMG French toast
column6: and the pineapple upside down pancake. Every single pancake had its own succulent taste that left me beyond words! I could go on about how this place exceeded my exceptions
column7: but know that I will be returning to dine again!
